attributes.additional_details:
I belive Soldier's should be allowed to carry Guns off duty to protect themselves, if they risk their lives in other countries fighting their enemies and are allowed guns then why the hell are they not allowed to carry guns off duty!

I for one would feel safer knowing off duty Soldiers who are trained to protect civlians lives and kill the enemy are not allowed to carry guns off duty providing the Soldier  is active.

Does it matter seriously which country they are in? be the UK or IRAQ no more victims.
